name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Model File
summary: Learn about .OGF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. uses the X-Ray Engine, which was developed by GSC Game World.

description: An OGF file is a 3D model used by S.T.A.L.K.E.R. first-person shooter games. It contains 3D meshes and animation data. OGF files are used for game models such as characters, weapons, terrain, and environmental objects.
